StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetEACEvent]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
--@PointOfContactID integer, --@En.tyTypeID integer AS SET NOCOUNT ON BEGIN --ContactName is a generalize name for any person or place SELECT
--These columns may be needed by the data contracts for insert/update oe.[FiscalYear], e.[EventID], e.[EventType], e.[EventName], hs.[HighSchool_Name] AS CollegeName,
/*EventName is speci.c to the EAC Event - The name of the EAC event for the college e.g., Homecoming, Welcome week). Pull up Challenge ,Athle.c Event, (Not sure if you want to list them all out.. Football, baseball etc.-Freshmen Orienta.on Spring Break, Air Show Diversity fair Diversity Event Sta.c Display Sponsored Guest Speaker*/
eac.[EventName],
hs.[HighSchool_Name], oe.[EventDate],
ec.[Coordina.onBeginDate], ec.[RequiredLogis.cs],
RTRIM (pc.POCLastName) + ',' + RTRIM(pc.POCFirstName) + '.' + IsNull(substring(pc.POCLegalMiddleName,1,1),'') + '.' AS POCName, [POCLastName], [POCLegalMiddleName], [POCFirstName], [TelephoneNumber]
FROM [MCRISS].[USMC].[EACEvent]eac inner join [MCRISS].[USMC].[Organiza.onEvent]oe ON eac.Organiza.onEventID = oe.Organiza.onEventID inner join [MCRISS].[USMC].[Event] e ON e.EventID = oe.EventID le. outer join [MCRISS].[USMC].[EventCoordina.on] ec ON ec.Coordina.onEventID = oe.Coordina.onEventID le. outer join [MCRISS].[USMC].[PointOfContact] pc ON pc.PointOfContactID = oe.PointOfContactID le. outer join [MCRISS].[dbo].High_School hs ON hs.SCHOOL_CODE = oe.CollegeID
END
--- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
